Based on the given preferences and movie lists, I would recommend both "Taken" (2008) directed by Olivier Rabourdin and "Monsters, Inc." (2001) directed by Pete Docter.

"Taken" (2008) is a thrilling action-packed film starring Liam Neeson as the main protagonist. The movie follows a father who goes to rescue his kidnapped daughter from her captors who are a group of ruthless criminals that are on the loose in Europe and the United States. 

On the other hand, "Monsters, Inc." (2001) is an animated comedy film directed by Pete Docter. The movie tells the story of three monsters - James (voiced by Jim Henson), Scully (voiced by Brian Postleman) and the third, who has been kept in secret all his life (voiced by Jack Black). 

These two movies have different genres, "Taken" is an action-packed thriller while "Monsters, Inc." is an animated comedy film. However, both movies have elements of adventure and excitement that can appeal to viewers with similar preferences.
